title: Digital UI Sounds - Sound Effects
description: Make your UI come to life with this Sounds for your game :)
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


In this package you will have access to 200 user interface audio files. There are Clicks, Exchange Options, Confirmations, Return, Equip Item, among others. All are made with a very high quality so you can simply import them into your project and start using them without the need for any editing.


I'm sure this pack will be useful not only for its interface, but also for small actions, such as: Getting an item/artifact/relic, something like that, Finding some kind of treasure, maybe even something aimed at RPGS like Leveling E upgrade a weapon or equipment.


This pack has two previews because it already got an update! You will receive the sounds of all two videos, totaling 200 files.


And it's worth remembering that by investing in this pack you take all that and still help me to continue creating quality sound effects at a nice price for the community! :D



Check the Update One[INCLUDED]

Check the preview

Check the documentation

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 200

Number of Audio Cues: 200

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
